channel.title: I added this handler, How would I do this
channel.description:
Hi, above my process was special attacks, I moved them to a handler, added the handler to server.java, and above void process, I added this:
[code]server.specialAttackHandler[/code]
I got this error:
[code]client.java:13839: <identifier> expected server.specialAttackHandler ^ 1 error Server Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
How do I fix?
Thanks alot.
Musicmad441

item.title: I added this handler, How would I do this
